casebody.data:
US BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, not in its individual capacity, but solely as trustee for the RMAC Trust, Series 2016-CTT, Plaintiff,
v.
Sandra LOPAZ, Defendant-Movant,
and
Mr. Lopaz, Unknown Spouse of Sandra Lopaz, Capital One Bank U.S. N.A., US Equities Corp, and State of New Jersey, Defendants. M-998/999 September Term 2018
082123 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 3, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions to expand the record (M-998) and for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification (M-999) are denied.
